attributes.action: Please suspend the construction of any more Wind turbines
attributes.additional_details:
It has been reorted this week that  thousands of birds are fatally or critically injured in the UK  by flying into wind turbines.

This is ecologically   too high a price to pay  for  generating electricity  by this inefficient and  extremely expensive  method of  power generation.

Please have a moratorium on the construction of any more unpopular wind turbine "farms"
